Create, edit, and collaborate on spreads: 在线创建、编辑和协作电子表格
Add a new row of data to a specific spre: Add a new row of data to a specific spreadsheet.
Add multiple rows of data at once to a s: Add multiple rows of data at once to a specific spreadsheet.
Update the data in an existing row.
Updates multiple rows in a specific spre: 在特定的电子表格中更新多行。
Delete a specific row from the selected: Delete a specific row from the selected sheet.
Look up rows in a worksheet based on a c: Look up rows in a worksheet based on a column value.
Create a new blank worksheet with a titl: Create a new blank worksheet with a title.
清除现有工作表上的所有行.
Format one or multiple rows in specific: Format one or multiple rows in specific spreadsheet.
Retrieve a specific row using its unique: Retrieve a specific row using its unique ID.
Get next group of rows from a specifiec: Get next group of rows from a specifiec workheet
Get all the rows from a specific sheet.
Creates a new worksheet by copying an ex: 通过复制现有工作表创建一个新工作表。
Creates a new column in a specific sprea: Creates a new column in a specific spreadsheet.
Download a worksheet as a CSV or TSV fil: Download a worksheet as a CSV or TSV file.

Title: 标题
Spreadsheet Containing the Worksheet to: 包含工作表的数据表以复制
Turn this on to also see spreadsheets fr: Turn this on to also see spreadsheets from Shared Drives.
要使用的电子表格的 ID。
The ID of the worksheet to use.
Inserted values that are dates and formu: 作为日期和公式的插入值将被输入字符串并且没有任何效果
Select the format of the input values to: Select the format of the input values to be added into the worksheet.
Enable this option to replace all existi: 启用此选项可以用输入的新数据替换工作表中的所有现有数据。 这将清除超出更新范围的任何额外行数。
Enable this option to check for duplicat: 启用此选项，在将数据插入工作表之前检查重复的值。只会根据所选列添加唯一的行。
Inserted values that are dates and formu: 作为日期和公式的插入值将作为字符串输入，无效果
Enter the row number where your column h: Enter the row number where your column headers are located (usually row 1).
The number of the row you want to delete: The number of the row you want to delete.
The value to look for in the selected co: The value to look for in the selected column. Leave empty to return all rows.
Only return rows where the cell value ex: Only return rows where the cell value exactly matches the search value.
Start searching from this row number.
How many rows to return. Defaults to 1 i: How many rows to return. Defaults to 1 if not specified.
The row number that contains the column: The row number that contains the column names.
Use column names as keys instead of A, B: Use column names as keys instead of A, B, C.
The folder to create the worksheet in.By: 创建工作表的文件夹。默认情况下，新工作表创建于驱动器的根文件夹。
The ID of the worksheet to delete.
The ID of the worksheet to rename.
The first row number where formatting sh: The first row number where formatting should begin.
The last row number where formatting sho: The last row number where formatting should stop (leave empty to format only the starting row).
Enter the row number you want to retriev: Enter the row number you want to retrieve
Map A/B/C… to the actual column headers: Map A/B/C… to the actual column headers (row specified above).
\n**Notes:**\n\n- Memory key is used to:
**Notes:**

- Memory key is used to remember where last row was processed and will be used in the following runs.
- Republishing the flow **keeps** the memory key value, If you want to start over **change** the memory key.
The key used to store the current row nu: 用于将当前行号存储在内存中的密钥
Enter the name of the spreadsheet to sea: Enter the name of the spreadsheet to search for
If true, only return spreadsheets that e: 如果为 true，只返回与名称完全匹配的电子表格。如果为 false，返回包含名称的电子表格。
If true, only return worksheets that exa: 如果为 true，只返回与名称完全匹配的工作单。如果为 false，返回包含名称的工作表。
The column index starts from 1.For examp: 列索引从1.开始。例如，如果您想要在第三列中添加一列，请输入3。 f 输入小于1列将在最后一列后添加。
Select the file type to export the sheet: Select the file type to export the sheet as.
Return the exported data as text instead: Return the exported data as text instead of a file.
Authorization headers are injected autom: 授权头自动从您的连接中注入。
Enable for files like PDFs, images, etc.
HEAD: 黑色
Triggers when a new row is added or modi: 当新行在电子表格中添加或修改时触发.
Triggers when a new row is added to bott: 当新行被添加到电子表格底部时触发.
Triggers when a new spreadsheet is creat: 创建新的电子表格时触发。
Triggers when a worksheet is created in: 当工作表在电子表格中创建时触发.
Please note that there might be a delay: 请注意，由于谷歌的延迟，触发点可能会延迟3分钟。
Trigger on changes to cells in this colu:
Trigger on changes to cells in this column only. 
Select **Any Column** if you want the flow to trigger on changes to any cell within the row.
